scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name webapp
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:clean && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset:win: if exist .wrangler\state\v3\d1 rmdir /s /q .wrangler\state\v3\d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev:local
scripts.clean-port: node -e "console.log('Port cleaning not needed on Windows')"
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('Para testar, abra http://localhost:3000 no navegador')"
